meanings.definition: The basic monetary unit of Ukraine.
meanings.sent1: In Ukraine, you can buy many things with a hryvna.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for hryvna at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The hryvna in my pocket felt like a magic coin.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was worth more than a thousand hryvna.
meanings.sent5: The colorful hryvna bills fluttered in the wind.

meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Ukraine.
meanings.sent1: The price was listed in hryvna on the menu.
meanings.sent2: She counted her hryvna carefully before paying.
meanings.sent3: The cat played with a shiny hryvna coin on the floor.
meanings.sent4: His words carried more weight than any hryvna could.
meanings.sent5: The sound of hryvna jingling in the jar was music to her ears.
